message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. It's a good deal for both of us!
You took 90% last round, now it's my turn to take a larger share. This is a fair compromise.
I understand you want a bigger share this time, but 60/40 seems more fair. We can both get a decent amount, and this avoids further rounds where the money might become worth less.
I'm not willing to settle for 30% this time. I'll take a slightly smaller share now to have a bigger share later, when the money is worth less.
Let's end this now.  I'm willing to give you a larger share than last time, and we can both get a decent amount.  Continuing will only hurt both of us due to inflation.
